protocol.text: The data were normalized using Robust Multi-array Average(RMA) . ID_REF =  VALUE = Normalized expression signal values.

Total RNA was extracted from the base 4 cm part of inflorescence stems whose heights were between 12 and 17 cm of three independent wild type, C3H14/15 overexpressing lines and c3h14c3h15 double mutants.
Arabidopsis plants were grown side by side in the glasshouse with 22 degreeC and 16 h/8 h light/dark cycle.
Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared from 200 ng total RNA using Affymetrix 3‚Äô IVT Express kit according to the standard Affymetrix protocol
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45 degreeC on Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000.
